alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Bradley; Hamilton; McMinn; Meigs; Polk; Rhea; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 1:54PM CDT until June 25 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rhea County in east Tennessee... Bradley County in east Tennessee... Central Sequatchie County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Meigs County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Bledsoe County in east Tennessee... Central Polk County in east Tennessee... Southwestern McMinn County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Hamilton County in east Tennessee... * Until 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/. * At 254 PM EDT/154 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Charleston to 10 miles southeast of Dayton to 12 miles west of Pikeville, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Athens, Dayton, Dunlap, Pikeville, Decatur, Benton, Soddy-Daisy and Walden. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 15 and 50. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bledsoe; Bradley; Hamilton; McMinn; Meigs; Polk; Rhea; Sequatchie
